column2: "<%me>, about that orange flower... It seems Matoi WAS really only interested in it because it was pretty."
"Still, at least it made her happy, so..."
"Ahem... Anyway, I, um... There was this other flower she seemed really interested in, as well."
"Yes, you guessed it. I'd like to ask you to bring it back to me. It's a pink flower that grows on Naberius."
"Please, for Matoi's sake. Whenever you get the chance."
